Posts.Content: Blessings, I too have older children, 23 & 19, and often feel guilty about not doing things when they ask (they both live on their own). I worry about them if I die of cancer because they just lost their father last september to brain cancer, he was 43, I'm 39. Every day seems a struggle and I just keep putting one foot in front of the other. God bless, jhope
Posts.Title: ROTTEN Mother

Posts.Content: Jean, I have no experience in this area, first time breast ca survivor after chemo and rad. I just wanted to say God bless you and encourage you to keep fighting, love, Julia
